TO-DO LIST Write down your to-do list.
Set each task's importance and degree of difficulty.
Try to complete them all! GAMIFY LIFE What if your life were a game…?
What if your attributes could be measured with numbers…? EARNING REWARDS Level up your attributes by completing tasks on your To-Do list.
Gain all sorts of achievements and level up your life! CLOUD Share your daily life online.
Join a team online to complete tasks together. START LIFE UP

You will gain no exp when you complete this task. Continue? Set Reminder (Optional）You can set a reminder here. Start Time (Optional）If you want this task to appear on your daily list
before the day it is due, set an earlier start time.
By default, non-repeating tasks will start today,
and the default start time for repeating tasks is the beginning of the repetition interval
(e.g., 7 days before a weekly task, 1 day before a daily task). Deadline (Optional）You can set a deadline date here. Repeat Frequency Target Times Reward Task Notes Write your to-do thing down shortly (Optional）Write details down here. Set repeat frequency here. By default, it's a one-time task. (Optional）You can set a target for the number
of times you want to complete a task here.
After completing the task this many times,
you can earn extra exp. (Optional）Set a reward here. Default Restore Do you really want to restore?

Habit Develop Create a repeatable task Habit Novice Complete a repeatable task 10 times Habit Journeyman Complete a repeatable task 30 times Habit Expert Complete a repeatable task 90 times Habit Master Complete a repeatable task 365 times Bounty Mission Create a task with coin reward Counter Create a count task A Piece of Cake Create a task with no exp reward Impossible Create a task with Lv4 Difficulty and Importance Read It Later Receive shared information from other app to create a task. (e.g. Twitter, Chrome…) Working Day Create a daily task set to ignore some days of the week (e.g. every Monday and Wednesday). 这件事可有可无。它可以是“查一查某个时事八卦”这样的任务。它在某种机缘巧合下出现，只有勉强被你记住的价值，它的完成与否对你造成的影响可以忽略不计。 这件事值得上一点心。它可以是“每天背10个单词”一类任务。完成它对你而言并不能造成显著的影响，但它可以在潜移默化地数量堆叠之后，让你发现自己进步了一大截。反之亦然，如果无法坚持完成某些这个等级的任务，你可能会对应地失去一些重要的东西。 这件事需要引起你的重视。它可以是“在截稿期限前写完稿件”这样的任务。完成这样的任务，可以让你立刻显著地获得收益。反之，完不成这样的任务，你的损失可能会让你感到肉疼。 现在，立刻，放下一切其它事情，优先把这件事做完。这个级别的任务已经无法从好坏两个角度来区分，它会对你当下的人生造成极为严重的影响。完成这个级别的任务，可以使你达成令你兴奋的成就，或使你避免一些灾难性的后果；如果失败了，那情况会变得不妙，相当不妙。 没有任何难度。对你来说完全是举手之劳，不需要任何意志力，可以在极短时间内解决的问题。 有一点点难度。你可能会需要动一动脑子，花掉一些时间才可以完成这样的任务，或你对这件任务有所犯懒和抗拒，不愿意进行。 令人感到棘手。
你可能会需要进行一些学习、对你的知识进行补充，花掉不少时间来琢磨、试探后，才能完成这样的任务，或这件任务涉及到让你厌恶或恐惧的内容，需要消耗大量意志力进行克服。 几乎不可能完成。
这件任务触及了你的大量能力盲区，就像让高三学渣通过一学期的复习考上清华一样魔幻。由于能力的缺失，时间也相对变得极为紧迫，想要完成这个级别的任务，除非拥有超越人类的毅力，和永不放弃的决心。 Degree 文案：酷安 @风之心_天双 Alipay Wechat Donate Icon Designer CoolApk@这是一碗麦面

System LifeUp is a offline-first app. Login is only to access the world module, so switching accounts will not switch your local data.
Therefore, your local data will not be synchronized with the server.
Delete Do you really want to delete this achievement?
You can use the [Data Backup] Page in the [Settings] Page to backup/restore your data.
 We now support exporting your local data to a zip file, or syncing the data with WebDAV server that you set up.
 LifeUp will add Google Drive backup support in the future.
 
 To protect your data privacy and reduce use of the server, your local data will not be synced with the server, including:
 1. Local task data
 2. Local task history record
 3. Shop item data
 4. Local feelings data
 5. User achievements data
 6. Statistics data
 7. Settings
 
 Data that WILL be synced with the server include:
 1. Exp points
 2. System achievements
 3. Teams
 4. Team task completion records
 5. Team task activities

Stock Quantity Unlimited Custom There is not enough in stock Owned: %1$d (Stock Quantity: %2$d) Owned: %1$d Sold Out Savings Balance: %1$s ATM ATM BACK DEPOSIT WITHDRAWAL Withdraw %1$d coins Deposit %1$d coins Withdrawal successful Withdrawal failed Deposit successful Deposit failed Not enough savings balance CLOSE Weekly Basic WorkDay Special Basic Definitions:
Deadline: The deadline of the repeat cycle. This is not the end condition of the task. (Same for the Start Time)
The deadline of a daily task should be set to [Today] while the deadline of a weekly task should be set to [Weekend].

Repeat Frequency: Daily, Weekly, Monthly etc.
When repeating a task, its start time and deadline will be calculated by the repeat frequency.

For example, when repeating a weekly task, its next start time will be 7 days after the current start time; same for the deadline.
In most cases, you can just set up the deadline and repeat frequency, and the start time will be auto-calculated. How to set up a weekly task starting on [Monday], ending on [Sunday]:

Step 1. Set the "Repeat Frequency" to [Weekly]

Step 2. Set the "Deadline" to [Weekend] (Sunday) How to set up a task to occur on specific days of the week:

Step 1. Set the "Repeat Frequency" to [Daily]

Step 2. Tap the "Ignore" button to set the days of the week on which the task will occur How to set up a special task (e.g., daily task starting at 4:00 on the first day, with a deadline at 18:00 on the second day):

Step 1. Tap the [More Options] Button to show up the start time options

Step 2. Set the [Start Time] to the date of first day of the repeat, and set the time to "4:00"

Step 3. Set the [Deadline] to the date of the day after the [Start Time] day, and then tap the [Time] options the set the specific time to "18:00"

Step 4. Set the "Repeat Frequency" to [Daily] Select Shop Item Text Only Reward Get Reward Item「%1$s」×%2$d Undo Reward Item「%1$s」×%2$d ATM - ATM

The system achievement list cannot be deleted Do you really want to delete this achievement list? Cannot delete an achievement list that is not empty. View Icon Add new task found no shop item new item NEXT Crash Sorry about the crash. 
If it does not affect normal use, you can tick "Don't show again" and click the "Continue" button. 
If it makes you unable to use the app normally, you can choose to wait for the update to fix the bug, or enable Safe-Mode or export your data first. 

Note: In Safe-Mode, the app will not crash in most situations, but some functions may be broken and some pages may be shown incorrectly. Enable Safe Mode Check Update Export Data Continue Received rewards PREVIOUS ATM daily interest rate Earned %1$d coins interest on ATM should not be greater than 10% should not be greater than 100% Get an item from Loot Boxes a specified number of times Get「%1$s」 「%2$d」times from Loot Boxes
Hide Module You can hide any module that you do not need in the [Settings]-[Display] page. Reminder Sound The reminder sound effect volume is controlled by the system media volume.

You can disable all sound effects in the [Custom Settings] page. Step Counter The app cannot access the daily step count from the system.
Daily step count is calculated by subtracting the total step count as of yesterday from the total step count as of today.

 The count accuracy depends on conditions such as when the app is opened and when the phone restarts. As an alternative to automatic calculation, you can input the step number manually

or hide the step counter module in the [Display Settings] page if you do not need it.
Hello, World! In the World module, you can join a team to get team tasks/or share your tasks by creating a new team. Post Activities After completing a team task, you can post your activities or feelings about them with text and photos to the world. Creative Market View the creative shop items created by people all around the world.

And you can share your masterpieces!
ATM interest You can setup the ATM interest in the Shop Settings (in the upper right menu) to receive daily interest.
Probability The actual probability calculation formula of the item: the probability of the item ÷ the sum of the probabilities of all items.

For example, if you want to create an item named A with 0.1% probability:
Select item A and input 1% into its probability, and then select another item named B and input 999% into its probability.
Finally the probability of item A will be 0.1% and item B will be 99.9%. Don't show again
(unless next crash happened) Edit List
Uncomplete a task There are many ways to undo completed tasks:
1. Tap the undo button on the bottom popup window after completing a task.

2. Go to the [History] or [Calendar] page and then tap the undo button.

3. Check the [Show completed] checkbox in the top-right menu, and then tap the completion mark on the task.
Exp Penalty You will lose some exp when the task is overdue or given up.

If you have actually completed the task, you can mark it as completed and regain the reward.
Coin Penalty The coin penalty function is disabled by default.

You can go to the [Custom Settings] page to enable it and adjust the level of coin penalty and exp penalty.

Feedback Please feel free to provide feedback via the [About]-[Feedback] page. If you have any urgent issues, please contact me via email.

LifeUp is an indie app: it is difficult for us to test various mobile phone models and versions, and bugs are difficult to avoid.

Please let us know if you encounter a problem so that we can fix it. Ignore media/picture files
Total size: %1$s MB
(If the file is larger than 10MB, it is recommended to ignore the media file when enabling cloud sync)
Shop icon: %2$s MB
Achievement icon: %3$s MB
Task attachments: %4$s MB
Feelings：%5$s MB

Media file path：%6$s

It is recommended to remove unused attachment files or compress feelings image files manually.
In-app picture manager will be added in the future. Quick add notification Add your tasks from the notification bar
(experimental). May increase power consumption. LifeUp Quick Add Tap to add a task Not receiving reminders? Check the OS settings to make LifeUp able to run in the background.
Each operating system has different settings methods.
Please check the relevant information manually, we will organize it into a document later. Purchases Uses Rewards Unboxes

Hide all extra info Edit Timer Upload failed, please retry. DELETE GIVE UP I do not want coins Select All Continue to add next list 24-hour display Tasks Coins Reminder system The application uses system notifications to send reminder by default, which may kill by the OS.
If you frequently miss reminders, please change the reminder system in the task settings.

Calendar reminder system is available, which will not be limited by the operating status of the application, but it needs calendar read/write permissions. Multiple reminders To setup multiple reminders, you can create subtasks and set up a reminder for each of them. Click the "Overdue" button to change the state of the task.
You can also freeze suspended tasks in advance by long pressing the task card in the tasks page to avoid being punished. Deadline Time %1$s the next day Customize the default settings when creating a new task

Do exercise Use the repeat setting to set up a habit task Drink 7 glasses of water Count tasks can help you record the number of times you do some simple tasks. You will only get reward after drinking all 7 glasses of water. Do something positive Unlimited tasks will refresh immediately after being completed or given up.
Check this task when you do something positive. Or you can choose to GIVE UP to get penalty when you do something negative. Using LifeUp for 7 days You can set a target goal of your repeat task.
You can totally customize achievements: for example, when you complete this task for the first time, you will unlock a custom achievement. Life Upgrade Complete the example task [Using LifeUp for 7 days] once (the first day) Tap here to change the task state to completed All Show all tasks Day list Show tasks that will be expired today Week list Show tasks that will be expired this week (Monday-Sunday) Month list Show tasks that will be expired this month Counting down- The countdown is over remaining: New example tasks and items A new set of example tasks and shop items, which shows some use cases of repeat tasks and some new features including loot boxes. IGNORE Get up early Start time and deadline time settings can be used to limit the time range of a repeat task.
By the way, the default deadline without a specified time (hour, minutes) will be at 0:00 the next day. You can set a specified deadline you want in the next day to change this setting.

This year Open with browser Not set Exp Reward Item Reward Yearly Filter Tap to view feelings Fixed Reward Random Reward Fixed Group by list Ebbinghaus repeat It's based on the forgetting curve.

The schedule is as follows:
today→1 day later→1 day later→2 days later→4 days later→7 days later→15 days later→30 days later Target Times The target times refers to the total number of repetitions to be performed.

 For example, setting a daily task and setting the target number to 10 means that a total of 10 days of tasks will be executed.

 If you need to schedule multiple tasks in a repetition cycle, you can use counting tasks, subtasks, or [Unlimited] repetition frequency mechanisms. Activity not found. Try to follow someone! Extra time By tapping this button, you can increase the duration of focus time and gain extra tomatoes. Fixed Auto Random New Tasks Documents App Privacy Terms Designers Translators Email Thanks for your coffee! Letter Thank you for purchasing our app, this is the greatest support for us.

We have been trying to create applications with excellent user experience and become the benchmark of applications.

LifeUp features a one-time charge, no ads, no in-app purchases (if coffee is not counted), no subscription system, compact size but rich function modules, millisecond-level startup speed, reasonable permission requests, and user privatization of data storage.

We are limited by manpower, energy and cost. There are many functions that cannot be realized at present, but we will work hard to move forward.

If the app is really helpful to you, please consider rating our app, introducing it to people around you, or buying us a cup of coffee! The calendar permission is required to inserting or updating the reminder time in the calendar reminder method. Please enable Settings > Permissions > Calendar to use the calendar reminder method. Camera permission required. The camera permission is required to select pictures in the form of taking pictures. Please enable Settings > Permissions > Camera to select pictures in the form of taking pictures. Go to the app’s settings page to grant permissions Automatically backup files to the "download" folder
(experimental, Android 10 and above is required) Clear System Achievement Data Return all system achievements to locked state.
The unlocking of custom achievements is based on objective statistics, and it does not support direct recovery to unlocked. Reminder Reward Misc. The app has requested to pin the shortcuts.
If it is not pinned successfully, you can check the permissions in the application settings. Coin Activity Recognition permission required. The activity recognition permission is required to calculate daily steps.
This is an optional feature, you can also choose to manually input the number of steps or hide the module.
Compatibility configuration In order to use some of the functions of LifeUp ([Reminder], Pomodoro, desktop widgets, countdown, etc.), you may need to refer to this article for some configuration tasks.
Click on the details to jump to the link: https://wiki.lifeupapp.fun/en/#/guide/background_running this_string_only_available_in_specific_language_hint_login_method this_string_only_available_in_specific_language_hint_login_method_desc this_string_only_available_in_specific_language_hint_login_method2 this_string_only_available_in_specific_language_hint_login_method_desc2 this_string_only_available_in_specific_language_zh_feedback_method this_string_only_available_in_specific_language_zh_feedback_method_txc In-app feedback The device does not support this login method Connect to the world module Sign In With Google Sign In With QQ Sign In With Weibo Sign In With Facebook Offline Mode achievement unlocked No more data load more failed Loading... Are you sure you want to accept penalty?
(*At present, the penalty tasks do not support direct undo, but you can go to the history page and set it to complete status to get rewards back) Negative Task (Experimental function, this function may have the problem of incomplete function statistics and ineffectiveness. If you encounter problems, you can give feedback to the developers)

The negative tasks refer to tasks that only occur penalties, and can usually be used with "unlimited" repetition frequency to achieve bad habit records.

The negative task will execute the "give up" operation by default.

And the penalty coefficient of experience points and coins will be forced to be set to 1.
The experience value and gold coin reward value you set is the final penalty value.

Note: The item is still a reward. You can set up some punitive items. Negative Task (experimental) Deadline Custom This is an advanced function to set the vibration interval.

The unit of the number is milliseconds, which means that 1000 represents 1 second.

The numbers are separated by spaces, the odd numbers represent the duration of no vibration, and the even numbers represent the duration of vibration.

For example, 500 1000 500 2000, the representative will vibrate for 1 second after 0.5 seconds, then pause for 0.5 seconds and then vibrate for 2 seconds. (The feature is available recently, there might be no enough data) Group by list (All list of shop) Unboxing Each time you open the box, only one random item will be drawn.

However, if the item is set to [Fixed] reward, you will get a fixed number of items every time you open the box.

Therefore, [Fixed] reward can be used to implement functions such as multi-items rewards and multiple randomizations.
